mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.code, r.name, r.parent_name as parentName, r.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, r.create_company_id as createCompanyId, r.create_company_name as createCompanyName, r.create_date as createDate, r.create_org_id as createOrgId, r.create_org_name as createOrgName, r.create_person_id as createPersonId, r.create_person_name as createPersonName, r.delflag, r.parent_id as parentId, r.prefix_id as prefixId, r.sort, r.tend_id as tendId, r.update_date as updateDate, r.update_person_id as updatePersonId, r.update_person_name as updatePersonName FROM pt_sys_base_region r where r.delflag=0 order by r.sort
SELECT DISTINCT ( CASE WHEN t.parent_id is null THEN concat('null_', t.id) ELSE t.parent_id END ) AS parentId FROM (SELECT g.id ,g.parent_id from pt_sys_base_region g where g.delflag=0) as t
select count(t.id) from pt_sys_base_region t where t.delflag=0 and t.name=#{name}
select count(t.id) from pt_sys_base_region t where t.delflag=0 and t.name=#{code}
select t.id from pt_sys_base_region t where t.delflag=0 and t.prefix_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{prefixId}),'%')

SELECT r.id, r.code, r.name, r.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, r.create_company_id as createCompanyId, r.create_company_name as createCompanyName, r.create_date as createDate, r.create_org_id as createOrgId, r.create_org_name as createOrgName, r.create_person_id as createPersonId, r.create_person_name as createPersonName, r.delflag, r.parent_id as parentId, r.prefix_id as prefixId, r.sort, r.parent_name as parentName, r.tend_id as tendId, r.update_date as updateDate, r.update_person_id as updatePersonId, r.update_person_name as updatePersonName FROM pt_sys_base_region r where r.delflag=0 and r.parent_id=#{parentId} order by r.sort
